CodeExample.Title: Get the Item's name property
CodeExample.Summary: To get the Item's name property value, submit an HTTP GET request of the following syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /<version>/myOrganization/drives/<Drive.id>/files/<Item.id>/name HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: Alternatively, you can use the //myOrganization/drives//files/ URL to get the Item entity first and then parse the result to retrieve the name property value. In addition, you can append the ?$select=name query option to the //myOrganization/drives//files/ entity-getting URL to retrieve the name property value
